lead_paragraph: COHEN--Frances Milgrim, peacefully, on July 22, 2016 in Scottsdale Arizona. Loving wife of the late Seymour, devoted mother of Nancy, cherished sister of the late Jean Dranoff, dear aunt of Steve. Fran was adored by her "Four Legged Fur Children," Sophie and Jackson. Her loving nature, impeccable style and fashionista sense will be missed. Service Wednesday, July 27, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. at Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory may be made to: azrescue.org or Stroke Association. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COHEN, FRANCES MILGRIM
